Title: Please Stop Splitting Things - Alek's Blog
Description:
As engineers, we learn from the very beginning that bundling too many things together is bad. Be it writing a huge
function or a class file, having thousands
of lines.
The same holds true for non-technical aspects such as project documentation, project tickets, etc.

Title: Automating HTB with LLM-driven n8n Agent — Technical Writeup | luciuswayne.com
Description: Learn how an LLM-powered n8n workflow automated end-to-end exploitation of Hack The Box's Editor machine, from reconnaissance to flag extraction, and discover the pitfalls and safety considerations of automated red team operations.

Title: How banks create money (with your money)
Description: Let's say NewBank just opened its first branch. They start off with $0 in customer deposits. You walk into the bank with a big sack of cash with $100K in it and the bank manager says, "Hey, it looks like we have our first customer!"
